Comment: Abilities: ANso (Curse of Silence), Ubertip (Tooltip - Normal - Extended)
Value: Wreaths an enemy unit in a curse which cause damage over time, prevent the casting of spells, reduce movement speed by 25% and reduce attack damage by 50%.|n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 200 damage over 10 seconds.|n|nSoul Burn lasts twice as long on normal units.
